k’ubwonko bwe kuko icyo abonye, akozeho, ariye, yihumurije cyangwa 
yumvise gituma ubwonko butekereza, bwumva, bukiga kandi bugafata
title: Imyaka ya mbere y’umwana, cyane cyane itatu ibanza, ni ifatizo mu gukura k’ubwonko bwe kuko icyo abonye, akozeho, ariye, yihumurije cyangwa  yumvise gituma ubwonko butekereza, bwumva, bukiga kandi bug
content:
Imyaka ya mbere y’umwana, cyane cyane itatu ibanza, ni ifatizo mu gukura
k’ubwonko bwe kuko icyo abonye, akozeho, ariye, yihumurije cyangwa 
yumvise gituma ubwonko butekereza, bwumva, bukiga kandi bugafata.
Ubwonko bw’umwana bukura vuba mu myaka itanu ya mbere y’ubuzima, 
cyane cyane itatu ya mbere ibanza. Nicyo gihe ubwenge bw’umwana, 
kuvuga, imibanire n’abantu, imyitwarire n’umubiri bikura.
Ubwonko bw’umwana bukura uko abona ibintu, akorakora, yumva, arya, 
akihumuriza. Buri gihe umwana akoresha umwe mu myakura, kuko yose 
ihurira mu bwonko. Uko umwana abonye ikintu, yihumurije, yumvise, ariye, 
akorakoye, habaho isanisha mu bwonko bwe. Ibyo agerageza bishyashya uko 
abisubiramo bituma habaho rya sanisha rimuha uburyo bushya bwo 
gutekereza, kumva, kwitwara, n’uko yiga muri iki gihe no mu kizaza.
